KrioModel.title: Breaking the Language Barrier
KrioModel.description: Our custom models understand the nuances of African languages and dialects, starting with Sierra Leone's Krio.

Developers.description: Powerful APIs, flexible SDKs, and enterprise-grade infrastructure. Build the future of African AI with us.
Developers.integrationDesc: Our services are designed to be integrated into any workflow. From healthcare to finance, we provide the building blocks for intelligence.
Developers.docsDesc: We're polishing our API references and guides. Soon, you'll have everything you need to deploy Geneline-X in minutes.

KACCP.title: KACCP: The Foundation of Kay-X
KACCP.description: KACCP (Krio Audio Corpus Curation Platform) is how we arrived at our flagship Krio model. It's an open-source movement to build a high-quality, low-resource language dataset.
KACCP.longDescription: Developed by Geneline-X, KACCP enables collaborative transcription, review, and dataset export for research and language technology. The platform is designed for scalability and future support for additional languages.

transcribe.title: Collaborative Transcription
transcribe.desc: Engage communities to transcribe Krio audio clips into English with precision and context.

curate.title: High-Quality Curation
curate.desc: Rigorous review processes ensuring the highest quality dataset for training advanced language models.

research.title: Research Focused
research.desc: An open dataset that empowers researchers and tech-innovators across the globe.
